definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
statue of Chairman Mao Zedong (1893-1976) 毛澤東|毛泽东[Mao2 Ze2 dong1]

sentences.english: King David's statue was made of bronze and it attracted many sculptors .
sentences.chinese: 大衛王的塑像是用青銅鑄造的，吸引了無數的雕塑家。

sentences.english: The statue was cast in bronze.
sentences.chinese: 這座塑像是用青銅鑄成的。

sentences.english: Go ahead and buy that hideous, life-size statue of Wayne Newton.
sentences.chinese: 想買那個看上去醜醜的，真人大小的牛頓塑像嗎？

sentences.english: One day, mount Buddha flat unexpectedly, with statue to dish and food.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，竟登上佛座，與塑像對盤而食。

sentences.english: A 10-meter high sculpture of King is carved from the center piece.
sentences.chinese: 馬丁路德金10米高的塑像，就雕在花崗石的中間。

sentences.english: Ravenclaw's wearing it in her statue.
sentences.chinese: 拉文克勞的塑像上戴着它呢。

sentences.english: The statue was carved out of jade.
The larger one features four huge, 20-m-high statues of Pharaoh himself.
sentences.chinese: 其中一座廟宇有四個20米高的法老王他本人的塑像。

sentences.english: there stands a statue of Kuan Im,the Goddess of Mercy.
sentences.chinese: 矗立着觀世音菩薩的塑像。

sentences.english: The sculpture stands in the centre of the flower terrace.
sentences.chinese: 塑像坐落於花壇的中央。

sentences.english: The statue reposes on a pedestal.
Mr. Immelt has a statue of Mr. Reagan in his office.
sentences.chinese: 伊梅爾特的辦公室裏就有一尊里根的塑像。
她把那個舊的塑像扔掉了。

sentences.english: This is the statue of Emperor Yongle.
sentences.chinese: 這就是永樂皇帝的塑像。

sentences.english: In addition, the permitted along the gable of the two characters on stage lined with statues Ocean 500.
sentences.chinese: 此外，沿着佛殿兩山牆砌臺上還排列着五百羅漢塑像。

sentences.english: Please take a photograph of me in front of the Merlion .
sentences.chinese: 請在魚尾獅塑像前爲我拍一張照片。

definition: seated image (of a Buddha or saint)
standing image (of a Buddha or saint)
